name: Goodnight Butcher
description: Goodnight Butcher is an arcade-style horror game with an isolated, heart-pounding atmosphere which shifts seamlessly between running your butchery and running for your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel® Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbooks Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB of graphics memory Storage: 80 MB available space

reviews.review_text: i opened the game, walked around... the game gave me a discease ... stay away from this game. But hey, the uninstall button works! >:D
